name: Bobidi
headline: Gamified Trainig For Hospitality Workers
description: Bobidi runs SuperTalents AI, a gamified training solution to help restaurants and vendors boost sales by empowering their staff.

founders.name: Jeong-Suh Choi, Founder
founders.description: Jeong-Suh Choi is the co-founder, CEO of  Bobidi.  Choi drives Bobidi's vision to build the world where every AI in the world is helpful for everybody, and sets the strategy to accomplish the mission of making every data bit meaningful for people.  Choi dedicated the first half of his career working on multiple startups (sold the last one), and the second half in big tech companies (eBay and Facebook) as Product Manager.  Originally from Seoul, Korea, living in the Bay Area.

Products

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65eaa945c19d12b17a33b885/677df97615bf23d9b84e9ebe_hamburger.png)
One Stop Solution To Boost New & Repeat Guests
Engaging Quizzes That Connect Restaurants With Foodies
[Schedule a Demo](http://www.supertalents.ai/<https:/app.usemotion.com/meet/jeongsuh-choi/hjvfbxs>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65eaa945c19d12b17a33b885/6777883e3c4f7c8fa31dc181_Diagram-quiz.png)
Quizzes
Attract more new guests to your restaurants with interactive campaigns that are 80% cheaper.
Attract more new guests to your restaurants with interactive campaigns that are 80% cheaper.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65eaa945c19d12b17a33b885/6777889f37d4077f26501742_Diagram-insight.png)
Training
Convert them into returning guests by providing personalized training for your staff.
Our dynamic front-of-house training app empowers your staff to deliver unforgettable service, ensuring every guest enjoys an exceptional experience that keeps them coming back for more.
I want **NEW GUESTS**
I want **RETURNING GUESTS**
Better Training. Better Service.
More Repeat Guests.
Upswell Training helps you leverage various data, including menu, sales data, guest information to continuously train your staff in an engaging way.
Product overview
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65eaa945c19d12b17a33b885/676cf8b411901c8bc1f09d74_rg%201.png)
1
Reflect Sales
Integrate securely with your POS and use guest checks to deliver targeted training.
2
Learn
Enhance staff knowledge with daily quizzes, pairing tools, and actional tips.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65eaa945c19d12b17a33b885/676cf8b4391336b78af945b4_rg%202.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65eaa945c19d12b17a33b885/676cf8fae9e6132fcdc68ccb_rg%203.png)
3
Engage
Offer scalable, personalized training to empower every team member for success.
4
Iterate
Monitor staff progress, recognize top performers, and uncover coaching opportunities.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65eaa945c19d12b17a33b885/676cf8b431720bd3ab8e3804_rg%204.png)
Understand Exactly Where Your Money is Leaking
High employee turnoverand less motivated teams are very expensive. (Employee turnover costs $2K ~ $6K per person for hourly workers and $10K+ for managers)
One of the biggest reasons is poor onboarding and training. Make your training work and stop losing money.
What Makes Us Different
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65eaa945c19d12b17a33b885/677b92df24e68b6f38d8bc5b_dollar%20sign.png)
Sales-based training
Say goodbye to outdated training materials. Use daily sales data to uncover opportunities and help your staff act effectively.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65eaa945c19d12b17a33b885/677ba5450b634b312c634e5a_upwards%20arrow.png)
Consistent training
Don’t let employees consume information from a “firehose.” We help them learn and develop just in time with bite sized information.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65eaa945c19d12b17a33b885/677ba545c9c20859a4a948cd_personalised.png)
Personalized training
Every employee learns differently. Optimize training materials and channels to ensure every team member becomes an efficient learner.
What You Can Expect to Happen
Improved Employee Performance
Gamification activates the brain’s reward system with points, badges, or levels. Progress tracking motivates achievement and fosters collaboration and mentorship.
Reduced Employee Turnover
Boost retention by offering opportunities to learn and apply new skills. Confident employees are more satisfied, engaged, and loyal.
Happier Repeat Guests!
Confidence leads to better service, creating happier guests who return with friends and family. It’s that simple.
Real-world Use Case
We conducted a month-long test with a server at a steakhouse. The server completed a 1-minute quiz daily before their shift, focusing on LBW and menu items.
RESULTS
Daily sales
32% increase
Tips amount
Outperformed peers by 42%
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65eaa945c19d12b17a33b885/677b8853db8ba45a046bec8d_change%20asset.png)
A Better Way to
Approach Your Guests
For Guests
We run quiz campaigns and give cash rewards that can be used only at restaurants.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65eaa945c19d12b17a33b885/677a373816b092fdce4047e1_Coin%402-1792x1015-1.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65eaa945c19d12b17a33b885/677a3a453a123733a44ae0ca_Frame-1171275605.png)
For Restaurants
Stop telling people to come to your restaurants. Start quizzing them.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65eaa945c19d12b17a33b885/677a3a455ac833f8bb658ff5_Vectors-Wrapper.svg)
You got a new menu? Quiz people about it and reward the winner!
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65eaa945c19d12b17a33b885/677a3a4670e49bea944245b4_Vectors-Wrapper.svg)
You got a new event? Quiz people about it and get them more involved.
What Makes Us Different
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65eaa945c19d12b17a33b885/677a3fa33e0a161b42d5fc6d_Vectors-Wrapper.svg)
You Save A Ton
CAC (Customer Acquisition Cost) is over80% lower.
Work with us, and you’ll know exactly how many guests came through Upswell and how much they spent. We want you to focus more on enhancing guest experiences rather than spending time attracting them.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65eaa945c19d12b17a33b885/677a3fa43f1e57aa5632b7eb_Vectors-Wrapper.svg)
You Get Guest Data
We not only bring guests to you, but also let you know who they are.
Survey questions are embedded in the quiz, allowing you to collect contact information, favorite foods, desserts, and/or dietary restrictions - valuable insights you can use to build deeper connections with your guests
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65eaa945c19d12b17a33b885/677a3fa453e4e9f42ef7f4b4_Vectors-Wrapper.svg)
You Gain AI Superpowers
Features straight out of science fiction.
Upswell AI empowers your quiz creation, tracking, and content iteration. Just tell us what you need, then sit back and relax.
Here's How Much You Could SaveWith Upswell...
Price point per person| Cost to Acquire One Guest| With Upswell  
---|---|---  
Fast Food (<$15)| $25| 80% Cheaper ($5)  
Fast Casual (<$16 - $25)| $80| 80% Cheaper ($15)  
Casual Dining (<$26 - $50)| $125| 80% Cheaper ($25)  
Fine Dining ($50+)| $180| 80% Cheaper ($35)  
Note: The precise CAC could vary based on the seasons, concepts, and locations.
What? How is it Possible?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65eaa945c19d12b17a33b885/677a52cf031528e43d98b2e5_Vectors-Wrapper.svg)
People love quizzes: The CTR (Click-Through Rate) of a quiz ad is up to 20x higher than other ads or contents.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65eaa945c19d12b17a33b885/677b45cfde2f7088f09d4c10_arrow1.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65eaa945c19d12b17a33b885/677b45cf7e7befb05686c199_arrow2.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65eaa945c19d12b17a33b885/677a53b2dc87437a4c6d70dd_Vectors-Wrapper.svg)
Winners will visit the store and spend more than the reward they receive. It’s that simple.
How It Works
1
Run Campaign
We run quiz campaigns to help you attract new guests in the area.
2
Winners are Guests
Winners are rewarded with cash that can be used only at your restaurant.
3
Winners Check In
When winners check in at your store, the staff receives their information.
4
Provide Guest Experiences
Your staff provides personalized experiences based on guest information collected through quizzes.
[Schedule a Demo](http://www.supertalents.ai/<https:/app.usemotion.com/meet/jeongsuh-choi/hjvfbxs>)
Let’s Connect& Get You Started
Tell us a little about your restaurant, and we’ll help you take the next step.
[Schedule a Demo](http://www.supertalents.ai/<https:/app.usemotion.com/meet/jeongsuh-choi/hjvfbxs>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65eaa945c19d12b17a33b885/676e0fe04ec247130c1bcff6_mdi_linkedin.png)](http://www.supertalents.ai/<https:/www.linkedin.com/company/bobidi-inc/>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65eaa945c19d12b17a33b885/67721c9000543d5d2cb3bcc8_upswell%20favicon.png)[Terms and conditions](http://www.supertalents.ai/</terms-and-conditions>)[Privacy policy](http://www.supertalents.ai/</privacy-policy>)

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Bobidi**

Founded in 2021 and hailing from Los Gatos, CA, Bobidi is a forward-thinking company that operates under the mission of delivering *gamified training for hospitality workers*. As a participant in Y Combinator’s Winter 2022 batch, Bobidi has made significant inroads into the world of AI-powered employee training.

At the heart of Bobidi’s offerings is its flagship product, *SuperTalents AI*, designed to empower restaurant staff to enhance their service delivery and boost sales. This gamified approach not only makes training engaging but also helps in retaining employees, addressing a common pain point in the hospitality industry.

**Key Features and Products:**

1. **Engaging Training Solutions**: Bobidi’s *Upswell platform* utilizes gamification techniques—think quizzes and rewards—to make learning fun and effective. The training modules are customized to reflect actual sales data, making them relevant and actionable.

2. **Guest Engagement**: The platform is also an innovative tool for attracting new customers. Upswell runs quiz campaigns, offering cash rewards that can only be redeemed at participating restaurants. This strategy helps build customer relationships while driving foot traffic.

3. **Cost Efficiency**: By focusing on a data-driven approach, Bobidi claims its solutions can cut down customer acquisition costs by over 80%. This is particularly significant for restaurants looking to enhance their marketing efforts without hefty budgets.

4. **Personalized Learning Paths**: Recognizing that each employee learns differently, Bobidi tailors training materials to suit various learning styles, ensuring effective knowledge retention.

5. **Real-World Impact**: Their results speak for themselves. For instance, a quarter-long experiment with a server at a steakhouse showed a 32% increase in daily sales and a 42% boost in tips after implementing daily quizzes.

**Current Operations and Vision:**

With a lean team of seven employees, Bobidi remains agile and responsive in this competitive landscape. They’re not just focused on improving training; their goal is to transform the entire restaurant experience—from attracting new guests to turning them into loyal patrons. Their training modules empower staff to provide exceptional service, leading to happier customers and ultimately, a thriving business.

As they continue to refine their offerings, Bobidi is well-positioned to make waves in the hospitality sector by blending AI, engagement, and training in a manner that's both effective and enjoyable.

For more information, you can visit their website at [Bobidi](http://www.supertalents.ai) or explore their tools like *Upswell Play* and the *Upswell Quiz Maker* to see how they can transform your hospitality training and customer engagement strategies.
